verses.content: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: huon sûng tuollai sûngril lem dâi kawtkhâr saktieng sawng saw ni ruk sinthaw sûng po inkhâr a ta; amiruokchu, châwlni chun inhawng a ta, thla thar nia khawm chun inhawng bawk a tih.

Dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lampuia chun lal chu lût a ta; dâi kawtkhâr bieng sîra chun ngîr a ta, chun, thiempu chun a pumrawhmang thil- inhlân ding le, a inremna thilinhlân dinghai chu buotsai a ta; dâi kawt- khâr tuolpûka chun chibai bûk a ta; chun, fe suok nâwk a ta, amiruokchu, zântieng chen chun dâi kawtkhâr chu khâr ni naw nih.
Chun, châwlnihaia le thla thar- haia chun chu ram mipuihai chun LALPA hmaah dâi kawtkhâr lûtnaa chun chibai bûk an tih.
Chun, pumrawhmang thilinhlân lalin LALPA kuoma ân hlân ding chu châwlnia ding chu berâmte paruk demkailo, berâmchal demkailo pa- khat leh nîng a ta,
chun, bu thilinhlâna ding chun berâmchal pakhatah epha khat; chun, berâmtehai pakhatah bu thilin- hlân ding chu a pêk thei ang ang nîng a ta, chun, epha peia hriek hin khat leh.
Chun, thla thar nia ding bâwng- chal tuoi demkailo pakhat nîng a ta; berâmte paruk le berâmchal leh; an rêngin demkailo an ni ding a nih;

bu thilinhlân ding chu buotsai a ta, bâwngchal ding chun epha khat, berâmchal ding chun epha khat bawk; chun, berâmtehai ta ding chun ân hlân thei ang tâwk tâwk nîng a ta; chun, ephaa chun hriek hin khat a ṭhang pei ding a nih.
Chun, lal chu a va lût pha chun dâi kawtkhâr tuolpûk lampuia khan a fe ding a na; chutaka bawk chun a suok nâwk ding a nih.

“Nisienlakhawm, chu rama mi- hai ruoiṭhe hunbi neia LALPA hmaa an hung chun chibai bûk dinga hmârtieng dâi kawtkhâr lampuia lût chu simtieng dâi kawtkhâr lampuia khan a suok ding a nih; chun, simtieng dâi kawtkhâr lampuia lût chu hmârtieng dâi kawtkhâr lampuia khan a suok ding a nih; a hung lûtna dâi kawtkhâr lampuia ma khan a kîr nâwk ding a ni nawh a, amiruokchu, a hmaa khan a fe thleng nghâl lem ding a nih.
An lût pha chun, lal chu anni le chun a lût ding a na, chun, an suok pha khawma, anni ruolin a suok ding a nih.

Ruoiṭhenahaia le, ruoiṭhe hunbi neihaia chun bu thilinhlân chu bâwngchal pakhatah epha khat nîng a ta, berâmchal dingin epha khat bawk, chun, berâmtehai ta ding chun a pêk thei zât zât le, epha khata chun hriek hin khat pei leh.

Chun, lal chun mâni nuomthua thilinhlân, pumrawhmang thilinhlân amanih, inremna thilinhlân amanih, mâni nuomthua LALPA kuoma thil- inhlân anga a buotsai pha chun, sak- tieng pang ngha dâi kawtkhâr chu mi pakhatin hawngpêk a ta; a pumraw- hmang thilinhlân le, a inremna thil- inhlânhai chu châwlnihaia thaw ang bawk khan buotsai a tih; chun, suok a ta, a suok hnung chun mi pakhatin dâi kawtkhâr chu khâr a tih.
Ni tin LALPA ta dingin pum- rawhmang thilinhlâna dingin berâm- te kum khat mi demkailo buotsai i ta; zîngkâr tina dingin i buotsai ding a nih.

Chun, zîng tin tin chun chu le chun bu thilinhlân khawm buotsai i ta, epha hmun ruka ṭhea hmun khat le, hriek hin hmun thuma ṭhea hmun khat, chu beiphit inditak chu suk- tlawr dingin; chun, dân um zing angin, LALPA kuoma bu thilinhlân chu a ni zing zing ding a nih.
Chuong ang chun berâmte chu buotsai an ta, bu thilinhlân le, hriek leh, zîng tin tina pumrawhmang thilinhlân zing zing ni ding chun.

“Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Lalin a naupasal a tu kuom- a khawm thilpêk pe ta ang sienla, ama rochan a na, a naupasalhai ta chu a ni hrim ding a nih; rohluo tieng kawnga an thil chan chu a nih.

Amiruokchu, a suok pakhat kuoma chun a rochan chu thilpêk anga a pêk chun; ama chu insuo a ni kum chen chun a ta nîng a ta; chu zoa chun lal kuoma ma chun inkîr nâwk nîng a tih; ama rochan hrim kha chu a naupasalhai ta ding nîng a tih.

Chu nawa khawm chun, lal chun an thil neihaia anni nêksâwr dingin mihai rochan chu a lâkpêk ding a ni nawh a; an in le loa inthawk a hnawt suok ding a ni nawh, ama thil neia inthawk ngeiin a naupa- salhai chu rochan a pêk lem ding a na, chuongchun, ka mihai chu mâni thil neia inthawka mi tin chu an indar nawna dingin,” tiin.
Chun, dâi kawtkhâr sîra um lûtna chu a mi fethlengpui a, thiem- puhai pindan inthieng sim sawng- haia chun a mi ṭhuoi tah a; chun, ngai ta, a saktieng pang hnungtienga chun hmun hi a um a.

Chun, ka kuoma chun, “Hi hi a nih thiempu haiin bawsietna thilin- hlân chu an suongna ding le, suol thilinhlân an suongna ding hmun chu; bu thilinhlân khawm hitaka hin em bawk an tih; chuongchun, mipui chu hlânthieng dingin huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun an hung chawisuok ding a ni nawh,” a ta.
Chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi a, chuongchun, huon kil lia chun a mîn fethlengtir a; chun, ngai ta, chu huon ki tina chun tuollai hi a um a.
Huon sûng tuollai kihai pali chun tuollai inhuonkhum, tawng sâwmlia sei, tawng sâwmthuma lien hi a um a; hieng a kihai pali hi intiet seng an nih.
An sûnga hmun li sûnga a vêl el chun lung an rem tlar a, chun, a vêl el chun chu tlarhai hnuoia chun suong- na thukhai siem a na.
Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hieng hi thil suongna in, hi in rawngbâwltuhaiin mihai inthâwi- nahai an suongna ding chu a nih,” a tih a.
